%l.description: identity of the user determined by identd

%u.description: user name determined by HTTP authentication

%t.description: time when the request was received

%>s.description: status code sent from the server to the client

%b.description: size of the response to the client (in bytes)

%{Referer}i.description: URL which linked the user to your site

%{User-agent}i.description: the web browser and platform used by the visitor to your site
